title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: Digital-Based Medical Education Effectiveness Enhancement Project

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can acquire 80% or more of foundational medical knowledge by utilizing digital tools in a blended learning environment.
Learners can derive three or more effective utilization strategies for digital educational materials through project-based assignments.
Learners can analyze the impact of digital education on knowledge acquisition, satisfaction, and clinical applicability through formative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
